description: This file implements the methods of the ProviderRegistry class, which manages the registration, unregistration, lookup, and cleanup of providers associated with different capabilities and connection IDs in a plugin-based system.

classes.name: ProviderRegistry
classes.description: A class that maintains mappings between capability strings and provider entries, also tracking connections and their associated capabilities, with thread safety measures.

methods.name: uint32_t Register(const std::string & capability,const std::string & appId,uint32_t connectionId)
methods.description: Registers a capability with a specific application ID and connection ID, updating internal mappings and timestamp.

methods.name: uint32_t Unregister(const std::string & capability,uint32_t connectionId)
methods.description: Unregisters a capability from a specific connection, verifying ownership and updating mappings.

methods.name: bool Find(const std::string & capability,ProviderEntry & out) const
methods.description: Lookup method to find provider details based on capability string.

methods.name: void CleanupByConnection(uint32_t connectionId)
methods.description: Removes all capabilities associated with a specific connection ID.

ctags.name: Find
ctags.pattern: /^bool ProviderRegistry::Find(const std::string& capability, ProviderEntry& out) const {$/

ctags.name: Register
ctags.pattern: /^uint32_t ProviderRegistry::Register(const std::string& capability, const std::string& appId, uin/
